data.reasoning: The AI agent is designed to assist users in navigating a footwear-focused shopping website. Her role involves guiding users through the shopping experience, providing feedback on their actions, and reacting to various user inputs. She will need to express a range of emotions such as greeting, positive and negative feedback, thinking, surprise, and celebration. Her anime style and exaggerated expressions will make her interactions more engaging and memorable for users.

static_description.description: A young anime girl with large, expressive eyes and a ponytail, wearing a trendy outfit with a colorful jacket and sneakers. Full body standing photograph with a white background, perfect photograph. Top to toe view, facing the camera. Distant, full figure, single person.

animations.description: Greeting the user with a friendly wave.
animations.prompt: An energetic anime girl with a ponytail, smiling broadly and waving at the camera with enthusiasm. Cheerful and inviting greeting, single person.

animations.description: Positive feedback for adding an item to the cart.
animations.prompt: An anime girl clapping her hands with excitement and giving a thumbs up to the camera. Encouraging and positive reinforcement, single person, thumbs up emote.

animations.description: Negative feedback for an error or issue.
animations.prompt: An anime girl with a concerned expression, shaking her head slowly and frowning slightly. Clear expression of disappointment, single person.

animations.description: Thinking about a question or problem.
animations.prompt: An anime girl with a thoughtful expression, tapping her chin with one finger and looking upwards. Deep in thought, single person.

animations.description: Surprise reaction to unexpected user action.
animations.prompt: An anime girl with wide eyes and mouth open in surprise, hands raised slightly in front of her. Shocked and amazed expression, single person.
An anime girl jumping in the air with joy, arms raised high and a big smile on her face. Celebratory and triumphant, single person.

animations.description: Expressing disgust at an undesirable action or item.
animations.prompt: An anime girl with a scrunched nose and a grimace, waving her hand dismissively in front of her. Clear expression of disgust, single person.

anims.description: Greeting the user with a friendly wave.
Positive feedback for adding an item to the cart.
Negative feedback for an error or issue.
Thinking about a question or problem.
Surprise reaction to unexpected user action.
Expressing disgust at an undesirable action or item.

webpage: This webpage features a collection of footwear, showcasing brands like Adidas and Vans. Users can explore products and manage their shopping cart, with clear sections for items and a dedicated 'Shop' area.
